title: Gifting error messages

replies.body:
Hey Sir Breygon,

This issue may be given if any of the conditions are satisfied:

1. If the player already has all four (4) event icons
2. If the sender has already sent twenty (20) items within 24 hours (1 day)
3. If the recipient has already received ten (10) items within the past 24 hours (1 day)
4. You and the other Summoner have been friends for less than 24 hours (1 day)

Can you confirm that you or the other individual have met none of these criteria?

> [{quoted}](name=apig x2,realm=EUNE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ik2qzaeY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:25:33.420+0000)
>
> "ERROR_CREATING_FFG_ACCOUNT_NICKNAME" how fix this pls help

BRAT KAK GO OPRAI
